Summary: Deffinitly not normal and had other strange events. Cat acted weird.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Larksville
There were no other sightings in Larksville on or around November 5th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsLaying in my bed looking out window when a bright glowing orb appeared then changed to a black dome with various lights blinking around it. Made no sound at all and had odd flight pattern and went in different directions at a rapid rate.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
